CustomField.description: The hierarchical level of this form component - 0 if it has no parent group component, 1 if it is the child of a top-level group component, etc.
CustomField.formula: /* Count number of "."s in the hierarchical sort num. */ LEN( Hierarchical_sort_num__c ) - LEN(SUBSTITUTE( Hierarchical_sort_num__c , ".", ""))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The hierarchical level of this form component - 0 if it has no parent group component, 1 if it is the child of a top-level group component, etc.
CustomField.label: Hierarchical level num
